mapper.select: SELECT /* cslCure.getCslCure */ CC.MBR_NO , CC.CSL_NO , CC.CSL_ID , SU.USR_NM AS CSL_NM , CC.CSL_DT , CC.CSL_FM_TM , CC.CSL_TO_TM , CC.CSL_TERM_TM , CC.PGM_CD , CC.CSL_TGT_CD , CC.CSL_TP_CD , CC.RSKA_TP_CD , CC.RSKB_TP_CD , CC.RSKC_TP_CD , CONVERT(CC.RSK_SCO, CHAR) AS RSK_SCO , CC.CSL_SBJ , CC.CRISIS_COUNSEL , CC.URS_CD , CC.CSL_TGT , CC.DRUG_USE_CD , CC.OLD_ACT_CD , CC.ACT_CD , CC.AROUND_SUICIDE_CD , CC.SUICIDE_PLAN_CD , CC.OLD_ACT_WAY_CD , CC.ACT_WAY_CD , CC.CURE_CD , CC.CSL_CTNT , CC.CSL_RST , CC.NXT_CSL_DT , CC.NXT_CSL_TM , CC.NXT_CSL_CTNT , CC.FILE_ID , CC.CRE_ID , CC.CRE_DT , CC.UPD_ID , CC.UPD_DT , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(MM.MBR_NM), #{paswKey}) AS CHAR) AS MBR_NM , SC01.CD_NM AS GEND_NM , MM.AGE , MM.REG_DT , SC02.CD_NM AS MEDIC_CARE_NM , SC03.CD_NM AS STS_NM , SC04.CD_NM AS JOB_NM , SC05.CD_NM AS SITE_NM , SU2.USR_NM AS MNG_USR_NM , SC06.CD_NM AS CSL_TGT_NM , SC07.CD_NM AS CSL_TP_NM , SC08.CD_NM AS RSKA_TP_NM , SC09.CD_NM AS RSKB_TP_NM , SC10.CD_NM AS RSKC_TP_NM , SC11.CD_NM AS URS_NM , FI.ORIGNL_FILE_NM FROM CSL_CURE CC INNER JOIN MST_MBR MM ON MM.MBR_NO = CC.MBR_NO LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU ON (SU.USR_ID = CC.CSL_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU2 ON (SU2.USR_ID = MM.MNG_USR_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC01 ON (SC01.GRP_CD = 'C1100' AND SC01.CD_ID = MM.GEND_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC02 ON (SC02.GRP_CD = 'C3100' AND SC02.CD_ID = MM.MEDIC_CARE_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC03 ON (SC03.GRP_CD = 'C5500' AND SC03.CD_ID = MM.STS_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC04 ON (SC04.GRP_CD = 'C1200' AND SC04.CD_ID = MM.JOB_CD ) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC05 ON (SC05.GRP_CD = 'C3500' AND SC05.CD_ID = SU.SITE_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC06 ON (SC06.GRP_CD = 'C2500' AND SC06.CD_ID = CC.CSL_TGT_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC07 ON (SC07.GRP_CD = 'C1600' AND SC07.CD_ID = CC.CSL_TP_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC08 ON (SC08.GRP_CD = 'C2100' AND SC08.CD_ID = CC.RSKA_TP_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC09 ON (SC09.GRP_CD = 'C2200' AND SC09.CD_ID = CC.RSKB_TP_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC10 ON (SC10.GRP_CD = 'C2300' AND SC10.CD_ID = CC.RSKC_TP_CD) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC11 ON (SC11.GRP_CD = 'C5600' AND SC11.CD_ID = CC.URS_CD) LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON (FI.FILE_ID = CC.FILE_ID) WHERE CC.CSL_NO = #{cslNo}

SELECT /* cslCure.getCslCureSeq */ CONCAT('C', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H'), LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTR(CSL_NO, 12) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 4, '0')) AS rcpSeq FROM CSL_CURE WHERE CSL_NO LIKE CONCAT('C', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H'), '%')
mapper.delete: DELETE /* cslCure.deleteCslCure */ FROM CSL_CURE WHERE CSL_NO = #{cslNo}
